extension.description: A VS Code extension that hosts an MCP server with user confirmation tools
config.title: MCP Server
config.port.description: Port number for the MCP server
config.autoStart.description: Automatically start the MCP server when VS Code opens
config.retryOnCancel.description: If enabled, when the user cancels a dialog, the tool will retry once more before allowing the agent to end
notification.youCancelledPleaseRespond: You cancelled. Please respond to continue.
notification.cancelledPreviousDialog: You cancelled the previous dialog. Please provide a response.
server.portInUse: Port {0} is already in use. Please change the port in settings.
statusBar.running: Seamless Agent running on port {0}. Click to restart.
statusBar.stopped: Seamless Agent stopped. Click to restart.
